name: Wavetable Waveshaper
description: This algorithm is based on the Wavetable Waveshaper algorithm from the disting mk4. It functions as a wavetable-based waveshaper effect when applied to audio, or as a wavetable-based transfer function when considering input as CV lookup. This makes it suitable for phase distortion synthesis. The display shows the current wavetable.
gui_description: The display shows the current wavetable.

parameters.name: Input gain
parameters.description: The input gain. Negative values invert the signal.

parameters.name: Level
parameters.description: The output gain applied to the shaped signal.

parameters.name: Width
parameters.description: The number of buses to process, starting from the Input. For example, for a stereo signal, set this to 2.

input_ports.name: Gain input
input_ports.description: Bus used to control the input gain via CV (scaled for 5V = 32x gain).

input_ports.name: Audio Input
input_ports.description: First audio input bus to process, starting from the specified 'Input' parameter value.

input_ports.name: Gain input
input_ports.description: The bus to use to control the input gain. Scaled such that a 5V CV gives 32x gain.

input_ports.name: Wave input
input_ports.description: Sets an input bus to modulate the wave offset.

input_ports.name: Input
input_ports.description: The first input bus to process.

output_ports.name: Audio Output
output_ports.description: Processed audio output buses, starting from the specified 'Output' parameter value.
